messages.messageBody:
-------Original Message-------

From: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Date: Wednesday, June 11, 2003 17:09:52
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] cult uniform

In a message dated 6/11/2003 1:27:38 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
> Thank you Barb, my biggest thing is that I'm just plain scared to drive
> with
> 4 kids all by myself

Well if it makes you feel any better...I've travelled all over the place
with
just the kids and I. The last conference it was just me and the kids, Jalen
was only one y.o. at the time. It's totally doable!!! And fun...but then I
am
the adventurous type. It's that ENFP thing. :)

Ren

=========
ahhh, maybe being an INFP is why I'm nervous about it..lol. If we do go it
without dad, a cell phone will be a must, that will help I think. We don't
have one now.
tammy

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
